work.position: Solutions Architect for Digital Marketing and Consumer Tech
work.summary:
As a Solutions Architect focusing on Digital Marketing and Consumer Technology at Carlsberg Group, lead the architecture and implementation of innovative solutions that enhance customer engagement and drive global business growth. My work involves collaborating closely with cross-functional teams to create scalable and secure digital platforms, ensuring that our strategies are both data-driven and aligned with business objectives.
Successfully led projects such as the development of Cookie Consent, Age Gateway, and Global Policies for global deployment. My expertise in frontend technologies like TypeScript React, and Headless CMS' like Umbraco enables me to deliver seamless user experiences while upholding the highest standards in security and compliance.

highlights: Architected and implemented global digital marketing solutions for Carlsberg Group.
Led the development of analytics frameworks for data-driven decision-making.
Collaborated with marketing, data, and engineering teams to align technology with business goals.
Ensured security and compliance in digital marketing initiatives across multiple markets.

work.position: Lead Developer and Architect for Malty Design System
work.summary:
As the Lead Developer for Malty Design System, I oversaw the development and maintenance of our internal design system using inner sourcing as our collaboration model.
Initially, the product required significant collaboration between our design and development teams to translate designs into developable components. And later, documenting a design system has proven to be a full-time job, requiring deep collaboration between design and development, as well as the business.
While most products were already in place, I am currently leading efforts to increase the penetration of Malty into our products. Through my work, Malty has become a core component of our digital ecosystem, providing a consistent and intuitive user experience across our products.

highlights: Architected and developed Malty Design System, implementing inner sourcing collaboration model
Successfully established Malty as a core component of the organization's digital ecosystem
Helped document design system, requiring deep collaboration between design, development, and business
Spearheading efforts to increase Malty's penetration into existing products for consistent user experience.

work.summary:
As a Principal Developer with a frontend focus, I was responsible for overseeing several critical components of our organization's technology ecosystem.
One of my key responsibilities was co-managing the development of Carlshop+, one of Carlsberg's B2B eCommerce platforms, generating over 1 billion euros in revenue each year. Additionally, I was responsible for frontend Development of Carlsberg's Cadi, an in-house built CRM system, ensuring that customer data was handled accurately and securely, and managing a team of frontend developers.
Another crucial aspect of my role was overseeing the development and maintenance of Malty Design System and Lean Sign-up platform, which helped to streamline our customer onboarding process.
Overall, my experience as a Principal Developer allowed me to play a critical role in driving the success of our organization. By focusing on frontend development and overseeing these critical initiatives, I helped ensure that our technology ecosystem was always at the highest possible standard.

highlights: Co-managed the development of B2B eCommerce platform (€1bn+ revenue/year)
Architected and developed Malty Design System from the greenfield
Oversaw development and maintenance of in-house built CRM system leading a team of frontend developers.

work.summary:
On a remote capacity, on a long term contract, I began work in January 2020 as part of the Carlsberg Group's Digital Team based in Lisbon, Portugal.
Developing a suite of solutions for both internal and customer-facing use, we are working hard to deliver a Single-SPA, TypeScripted ReactJS, AWS-backed framework, with a fully automated GitHub Actions delivery (CI & CD) pipeline, as well as several TypeScripted ReactJS, and Vanilla JS (ES8) child-apps within.

highlights: Co-created internal backoffice Single-SPA platform
Bolstered development platform by creating boilerplates
Kickstarted documentation of existing apps, and solutions

work.summary: In 2012, I brought an idea to life. I co-founded an organization called Greygoo, through which I helped some of the most renowned, high-performance organizations transform their businesses using web and mobile applications designed and developed by our tight-knit multi-disciplinary team, in addition to a number of external resources. We built alliances with premiere agencies across the medical, transportation, food and beverage, and numerous additional industries in order to deliver high-tech solutions that improved engagement and expanded outreach through our high-impact web development and business strategy skills. I directed all phases of each project lifecycle, from conception to deployment.

highlights: Partnered with GO GROUND, the official transportation agency for NCAA, building three web applications and two mobile applications for their use in executing events and serving customers.
Facilitated $200K contract with eventSpring in addition to six-figure budget for developing the platform.
Created wide range of mobile apps across various platforms, such as React Native and Ionic.
Contracted by clients across diverse spectrum of verticals, such as General Motors, Paulson Institute, Naperville Park District, and many more organizations as well as start-up businesses.

work.summary: Beginning late 2018 and contracted by Prizm Tech Group, I took a deep dive into the world Angular, working on a custom-built white-label Home Healthcare Management solution. As a Lead and Frontend Developer, I lead a distributed team from UX design, Database Schema and UI Implementation to deliverables. Leading all technical aspects of the project, I managed the day-to-day client relations, as well as Development Team goals, tasks and deliverables.

highlights: Led a distributed team through UX design, database schema, and UI implementation for a custom-built Home Healthcare Management solution.
Successfully managed client relations and ensured the timely delivery of project goals, tasks, and deliverables.
Demonstrated expertise in Angular, contributing to the development of a white-label solution for a leading technology group.
Technical lead and frontend developer, providing leadership and guidance throughout the project's development cycle.

work.summary: I was contracted by the engineering team at Cro Metrics to create, evaluate, and test various models for their clients. In doing this, I collaborated with team members from different departments and projects to ensure successful delivery. Serving on a decentralized team has its challenges, but using my effective interpersonal skills alongside my natural affinity for team building, I was able to maintain consistent communication with project managers and deliver phenomenal results for all of the projects to which I had the pleasure of contributing.

highlights: Successfully implemented conversion ratio optimization to engage end users by developing simple, elegant user experiences that exemplified application design principles.

Shared updates, relayed impediments, and provided intellect through JIRA and Trello, recording all client notes, technical and strategic learnings through Quip documentation, in a highly process-driven workflow.

work.summary: When Upshot, a fast-paced marketing agency, contacted me to help coordinate their high-priority digital development projects, I dove right in. I developed the frontend for a range of technical projects, and regardless of the scope or difficulty, I delivered results with impeccable timing and quality.
highlights: Led development for a six-month project with six-figure budget on behalf of Hilton Hotels, creating and developing collaborative content generation, management, and presentation tool for internal use.
Expertly designed and developed micro-sites, landing pages, promotional sites, and highly complex web applications for small brands as well as Fortune 500 companies, such as Anheuser-Busch and Omron.

Led development for a six-month project with six-figure budget on behalf of Hilton Hotels, creating and developing collaborative tool for internal use that facilitated content generation, management, and presentation.

Expertly designed and performed frontend development for micro-sites, landing pages, promotional sites, and highly complex web applications for small brands as well as Fortune 500 companies, such as Anheuser-Busch and Omron.

work.summary: For ten fruitful years, I managed telecommunications projects for one of the largest organizations in the industry. In doing so, I directed small engineering teams and third-party vendors to accomplish timely, successful roll-outs, and I built strong business relationships with our long list of high-profile clients.

highlights: Traveled nationally on behalf of Nokia for high-performance clients such as AT&T, T-Mobile, Alascom (AT&T Alaska), and AT&T Hawaii.

Managed $10M project for T-Mobile aimed to establish UMTS (4G) functionality for the first time in the United States for the company; oversaw Nokia RF Engineering team, as well as 20+ field crews, surveying cell-sites to assess and record UMTS expansion feasibility.

references.name: Peter Birkholm-Buch | Director of Software Engineering in Growth Products & Data @ Carlsberg Group
references.reference:
It has been a privilege to have Vicente as part of my Leadership Team at Carlsberg Group. As our Frontend Solutions Architect, Vicente played a critical role in shaping our frontend strategy, notably through the development of the Malty Design System, which has transformed how we approach global frontend solutions.

His technical expertise in JavaScript, TypeScript, React, and Frontend technologies, combined with his leadership in establishing a Community of Practice, has greatly improved the developer experience and code quality across the organization. Vicente's contributions were instrumental in driving our e-commerce growth to over €1 billion annually.

I highly recommend Vicente for his leadership, creativity, and exceptional technical skills. He would be a tremendous asset to any team.

references.name: Samuel Silva | Senior Frontend Developer @ Carlsberg Group
references.reference:
Working alongside Vicente on various projects over the past two years has been an absolute pleasure. As a Solutions Architect, he consistently shows dedication in delivering excellent solutions that meet our business needs while valuing the team's expertise every step of the way.

Besides his technical skills, Vicente is a team player who creates a positive and collaborative work environment. He consistently goes above and beyond to support colleagues and shares his expertise within our company's internal community.

I highly recommend Vicente for any project in need of a talented and dedicated Solutions Architect. He brings abundant expertise, professionalism, and enthusiasm to every project.

Collaborating with Vicente Opaso, the Solutions Architect and Lead Developer for the Malty Design System at Carlsberg Group, was a testament to his extensive expertise and professionalism. Vicente brought a wealth of knowledge to our work on the Malty design system. His deep expertise and unwavering professionalism were evident throughout our collaboration. Vicente's collaborative approach and ability to align technical intricacies with design aspirations made a significant impact, ensuring the scalability and success of the project. His commitment to excellence and adeptness in fostering collaboration make him a valuable asset in delivering robust solutions.
references.name: Thiago Mota | Senior Product Designer @ Carlsberg Group
Bruno Torres | Senior Frontend Developer @ Carlsberg Group
references.reference:
It's with genuine pleasure that I share my admiration for Vicente, the incredibly talented Frontend Solutions Architect I had the chance to work with at Carlsberg. Working alongside him has been more than just a professional experience; it's been a journey of growth and camaraderie.

Vicente stands out for his technical prowess and his genuine commitment to building a tight-knit front-end community. Under his guidance, I've felt a sense of trust and support beyond the usual workplace dynamic. Vicente's efforts to create a collaborative environment have made our team feel like a family, fostering an atmosphere where everyone's contributions are valued.

As a Frontend Developer, I've greatly appreciated Vicente's approach to problem-solving and his emphasis on sharing knowledge. His mentorship has elevated my technical skills and made our workplace a positive and uplifting space.

I wholeheartedly recommend Vicente Opaso to anyone looking for more than just a leader – someone who values humanity and teamwork as much as technical excellence.
